name: Uranus (itch)
description:
Warning: This game contains flashing patterns that might be disruptive to people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Uranus is a kaleidoscopic audiovisual playscape. It features procedural audio (input-based music) and visuals (systemic color scheme) and was designed to be experienced not only through play, but also live group viewings as a spectator. The rules are deceptively simple:

  • To win, you need to explode
  • To explode, you need to close your eye
  • To close your eye, you need to move
  • If you cross your opponent's trail, your eye opens
